messages.msgSnippet: ... Inventing a Girl: An Experience in Homeschooling a documentary by Fernanda Rossi THE FIRST DOCUMENTARY ON HOMESCHOOLING NOW AVAILABLE IN VHS! A charming
messages.messageBody:
--------------PLEASE FORWARD------------------

Inventing a Girl: An Experience in Homeschooling
a documentary by Fernanda Rossi

THE FIRST DOCUMENTARY ON HOMESCHOOLING
NOW AVAILABLE IN VHS!

"A charming an honest film... a must see for parents and educators."

John Taylor Gatto
Writer, "Dumbing us Down."


"I loudly applaud Ms. Rossi's efforts to share this unique approach to
living and learning, to bring new understanding about homeschooling to a
wider audience."

Helen Heneger
Editor "Home Education Magazine"


To place an order go to:

www.inventingagirl.com/ordertape.htm

You can also check www.inventingagirl.com
for a synopsis, a 5 min. preview and upcoming screenings.
